about_the_game:
The player finds himself in an abandoned Soviet bunker, built at the height of the Cold War. The protagonist is a stalker, a hunter for artifacts and secrets of the past. He entered the bunker, attracted by legends of secret experiments and the mysterious disappearance of all personnel.

Moving through the bunker, the player is immersed in an atmosphere of tense anticipation and fear. He finds notes, diaries, documents - fragments of stories of people who lived and worked here. The notes point to strange experiments being conducted in the lab and a growing paranoia among the staff.
In the library, the player discovers ciphers indicating the bunker's connection to the mysterious Project Phoenix. In the church - traces of rituals and attempts to contact otherworldly forces.

As the player explores the bunker, he encounters paranormal phenomena. He hears whispers, sees shadows, feels the presence of something otherworldly. In the laboratory, the player finds traces of dangerous experiments that have gotten out of control. In the tunnels - encounters the ghosts of soldiers guarding the bunker.
The player will have to solve the mystery of Project Phoenix, find out what happened to the bunker staff and find a way to get out of this cursed place.

As you pass, you will need to find keys and open locked doors. Solve puzzles and find passages. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the bunker and its rooms, collect batteries for your flashlight. Solve puzzles. The darkness can conceal various secrets.

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
